summary: A professional hockey team has placed a forward on injured reserve after an MRI revealed a minor fracture in his forearm sustained during a recent game.
A high-profile fashion designer has apologized after a social media post was interpreted as mocking a marginalized community's traditional attire.
The introduction of advanced video technology is set to become mandatory in all national football leagues, following a recent policy change by the sport's global regulatory authority.
A popular comedian has ventured into dramatic acting with his role in a new crime thriller film, now showing in select theaters.
A rural community has organized a weekend sports camp for children, featuring clinics in basketball, volleyball, and track and field.
A bestselling author has advocated for educational reform, proposing policy changes that address disparities in access to quality education.
